#summary List of instruction names

= Instructions =
== Currently Supported ==
MOV, LD, LDU, LDL, LDC, LDS, ST, STL, STS, FADD, FMUL, FFMA, IADD, IMUL, IMAD, ISETP, FSETP, S2R, LOP, I2F, F2I, EXIT, RET, PRET, BRA, CAL, NOP.

For more information regarding the supported instructions, their usage and opcodes, please see the [IndexPage#Fermi_ISA Opcode pages].

== All Known Instructions ==
The following part of this page lists all instruction names that are currently known. For instructions and their corresponding opcode, see [nanb] and [Opcode].

For better explanation of those instructions, please refer to the cuobjdump.pdf that comes with CUDA toolkit 4.0

<wiki:toc>
==In Alphabetical Order==
